info.title: Purplship Open Source Multi-carrier Shipping API
info.description:
Purplship is an open source multi-carrier shipping API that simplifies the integration of logistic carrier services

The **proxy** endpoints are stateless and forwards calls to carriers web services.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

get.description: Returns the list of configured carriers

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: test
parameters.description: The test flag filter carrier configured in test mode

parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset

post.description:
**[proxy]**

The Shipping process begins by fetching rates for your shipment.
Use this service to fetch a shipping rates available.

**[proxy]**

Once the shipping rates are retrieved, provide the required info to
submit the shipment by specifying your preferred rate.

get.description:
**[proxy]**

You can track a shipment by specifying the carrier and the shipment tracking number.

parameters.name: test
parameters.description: The test flag indicates whether to use a carrier configured for test.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

post.description:
Add one or many options to your shipment.
**eg:**
- add shipment **insurance** - specify the preferred transaction **currency** - setup a **cash collected on delivery** option ```json { "insurane": { "amount": 120, }, "currency": "USD" } ``` And many more, check additional options available in the [reference](#operation/all_references).
Select your preferred rates to buy a shipment label.

get.description: Refresh the list of the shipment rates

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

packagingType.title: Packaging type
packagingType.description:
The parcel's packaging type. **Note that the packaging is optional when using a package preset** values:
- **envelope**
- **pak**
- **tube**
- **pallet**
- **small_box**
- **medium_box**
- **your_packaging** For specific carriers packaging type, please consult [the reference](#operation/all_references).

packagePreset.title: Package preset
packagePreset.description:
The parcel's package preset.

For specific carriers package preset, please consult [the reference](#operation/all_references).

isDocument.title: Is document
isDocument.description: Indicates if the parcel is composed of documents only

services.description:
The requested carrier service for the shipment.
Please consult [the reference](#operation/all_references) for specific carriers services. Note that this is a list because on a Multi-carrier rate request you could specify a service per carrier.

options.title: Options
options.description:
The options available for the shipment.

Please consult [the reference](#operation/all_references) for additional specific carriers options.

carrierIds.description: The list of configured carriers you wish to get rates from.

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: The rate monetary values currency code

discount.title: Discount
discount.description: The monetary amount of the discount on the rate

baseCharge.title: Base charge
baseCharge.description:
The rate's monetary amount of the base charge.
This is the net amount of the rate before additional charges

totalCharge.title: Total charge
totalCharge.description:
The rate's monetary amount of the total charge.
This is the gross amount of the rate after adding the additional charges

dutiesAndTaxes.title: Duties and taxes
dutiesAndTaxes.description: The monetary amount of the duties and taxes if applied

extraCharges.description: list of the rate's additional charges

messages.description: The list of note, error or warning messages

image.title: Image
image.description: encoded base64 string of the document

options.title: Options
options.description:
The options available for the shipment.
Please consult [the reference](#operation/all_references) for additional specific carriers options.

docImages.description:
The list of documents to attach for a paperless interantional trade.

eg: Invoices...
